text: Togo has been to every Summer Olympic Games held since 1972 except for 1976 and 1980. No athletes from Togo have been in any Winter Olympic Games."In a kayak race, the first ever Olympic medal for Togo", International Herald Tribune, August 12, 2008 ==List of medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event Benjamin Boukpeti 2008 Beijing Canoeing Men's slalom K-1 ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * Togo profile at London2012.com Olympics Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Togo
title: Togo at the Olympics
